_meanings:
{@--2@} (In Vaiśeṣika <ab>phil.</ab>)
Striking against (such as gives rise
to sounds &c.), regarded as a kind
of {#saMyoga#}.

{@--3@} Striking back, driving
or warding off.

{@--5@} Abrupt or vehement
articulation of words (as of 
Vedic texts); sudden shock.

{@--1@} The
combination of the 4th letter of
any class with the first or third
letter of that class; of the second
with the first; and of the third with
the second letter of any class;  
{#aBiGAtaM syAtpUrvaM vedadvitryAdivarRAScet . navavargARAM#}
{#navato DaraRIcaMdradvirAmAdyAH#} <ls>Śabdak.</ls>

{@--2@} A
harsh pronunciation caused by the
neglect of {%Saṃdhi%} rules.
